posts.caption: Introduction to The Internet of Things (IoT)
posts.description:
Introduction to The Internet of Things (IoT)

Cairo Hackerspace always used to introduce the latest cutting-edge technology to Egypt and sharing this knowledge with everyone since 2009.
Arduino/open-hardware workshops since 2010 , the first open source 3d printer , the first 3d printing services and workshops , Virtual Reality workshops and different workshops in other areas of life.

THIS month we are introducing for the first time in Egypt a new promising  trend in technology that involves everyTHING around us , everyONE and every AREA in our life from agriculture, manufacturing, arts, business, technology, education to health and environment .
It is called  “ The Internet of Things ! ”

Cairo Hackerspace is joint with #GEW2014 as organizing partners with this course .

In this Practical course you will learn :
-What Is Internet of Things?
-What can the Internet of Things Do for Us?
-IoT around us
-Issues Around IoT
-IoT enabling technologies and Architecture 
-IoT opportunities in Egypt for startups and entrepreneurs 
-Getting started with IoT using Spark Core

Cairo Hackerspace IoT competition :
1st place : Spark Maker Kit *worth 99$ 
2nd place: Spark Core *worth 39$
3rd place: Surprise! *worthless!!
*Gifts are supplied by Spark.io and Instructables 
About Spark Core: https://www.spark.io/

Registration: http://goo.gl/forms/OjfVDjGGan

Prerequisites:
Laptop.

Cost: 
-Startups and Graduation Projects : 150 LE
-Members and non-members : 200 LE
-Corporates and Government organizations: 500 LE
*Everyone will get 2 weeks free membership to the  hackerspace ;)

Registration policy:
We are applying first-come-first serve basis , therefore early registration is encouraged.
The course maximum attendees is 10 persons.
The Course will be REPEATED for TWO WEEKS to give everyone a chance to attend , our registrar will respond to you within one week to confirm your final date.

Time:
2 days course:
-Early reg.: 20/11/2014 from 5:00 pm till 8:00 pm , 21/11/2014 from 2:00 pm till 6:00 pm.
-1st repeat : 27/11/2014 from 5:00 pm till 8:00 pm , 28/11/2014 from 2:00 pm till 6:00 pm.
-2nd repeat: 4/12/2014 from 5:00 pm till 8:00 pm , 5/12/2014 from 2:00 pm till 6:00 pm.

Place:
Cairo Hackerspace ,Townhouse building, 2nd floor
Address : 10 Nabrawy Street, off Champollion Street, Downtown Cairo, Egypt

Contact:
Mobile: 01225429869 
Email:   cairohackerspace@gmail.com

posts.message: Putting a brain in a plane (or how to build a UAV)
posts.caption: story.glass
posts.description: I am making a brain for my model plane so that it can fly by itself. I could have bought an off-the-shelf kit but I wanted to build it myself to understand how everything works from the ground up.

posts.caption: Draper University Meetup #1 in Cairo :: Meet Draper
posts.description:
Register here: http://bit.ly/DUCairo1

Meet Draper, the well known Silicon Valley investor and 1985 founder of Draper Fisher Jurvetson (DFJ) venture capital firm.

Few of Draper's investments are: @[260273468396:128:Skype], @[103757679662290:274:Hotmail], @[18790602800:274:Tesla Motors] as well as he founded @[267859313332483:274:Draper University] of Heroes & @[329474483849637:274:Hero City at Draper University].

Ask Draper about your startup idea, investments in Silicon Valley & most of all get his advice on how to disrupt the globe! 

Register here: http://bit.ly/DUCairo1

Agenda:-

A. Watch an inspirational talk by Trip Hawkins (Founder of Electronic Arts).
B. Know more about Draper University of Heroes.
============= Coffee Break =============
C. Get advice from @[710550:2048:Andy Tang] in a video Skype conference.
D. Ask @[1583615512:2048:Vicky Zhang] (Summer '14 alumna) about her experience in Draper University.
E. Experience Draper University presentation by @[754780105:2048:Shady Elyaski].
F. Meet, talk, chit-chat & mingle with the Egyptian alumni.

Limited seats, invitations only event.
Register here: http://bit.ly/DUCairo1
